name: Agent Builder Deployment Configuration
description: Configuration file for deploying Agent Builder to Azure using GitHub Actions

required.name: AZURE_CLIENT_ID
required.source: Azure Portal → App Registrations → Your App → Application (client) ID

required.name: AZURE_TENANT_ID
required.source: Azure Portal → Microsoft Entra ID → Tenant ID

required.name: AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
required.source: Azure Portal → Subscriptions → Your Subscription → Subscription ID

required.name: DATAVERSE_CLIENT_ID
required.source: Power Platform Admin Center → App Registrations

required.name: DATAVERSE_CLIENT_SECRET
required.source: Power Platform Admin Center → App Registrations → Your App → Secrets

required.name: DATAVERSE_TENANT_ID
required.description: Dataverse Tenant ID (usually same as Azure Tenant ID)

required.name: DATAVERSE_RESOURCE
required.source: Power Platform Admin Center → Environment URL

stages.name: build
stages.description: Build React frontend and Azure Functions backend

stages.name: deploy
stages.description: Deploy infrastructure and applications to Azure

setup: 1. Go to Azure Portal and get your Subscription ID and Tenant ID
3. Set up federated credentials for GitHub Actions
4. Assign Contributor role to the app registration
5. Add all required secrets to GitHub repository
